Take a look at all the aspects that effe: Take a look at all the aspects that effectively elevates the management of clients to the next level
Keep track of all your existing, as well: Keep track of all your existing, as well as prospective clients as you have access to all the mandatory data, along with the correct tools to enhance your knowledge of customers, and the service they receive
Efficient management of all the on-going: Efficient management of all the on-going and potential projects makes your business objectives conspicuous and gives you a clear idea regarding the status, progress and timelines of projects
Handle your employees effectively as the: Handle your employees effectively as the platform allows you create and manage employee profiles, such as name, contact information, job title, and performance metrics, and also includes tools for better communication among employees
Optimize your Sales process, from lead g: Optimize your Sales process, from lead generation to deal closure
Effectively manage your business income: Effectively manage your business income related to customer interactions, sales and marketing efforts
Improve the service given to customers b: Improve the service given to customers by having access to comprehensive customer data, essentially increasing the volume of sales and growing your business and the presence of tools such as case management and ticket tracking equates to improved client satisfaction
Deal with daily tasks in a much more org: Deal with daily tasks in a much more organized manner as you have the ability to assign members to a specific task, track the progress, check the status, as well as to communicate with the assigned members to gather profound information regarding the task in hand
Allows effective management of inventory: Allows effective management of inventory of products or services, Have access to stock tracking, reordering, and inventory forecasting tools to optimize inventory management processes
Enables scheduling of meetings with cust: Enables scheduling of meetings with customers, prospects, and team members to further optimize the communication process as a whole, Access to reminders and follow-up tools increases meeting productivity and helps build long-lasting customer relationships
Plan, track, and analyze customer visits: Plan, track, and analyze customer visits by sales representatives or other team members
View the attendance records of employees: View the attendance records of employees to have an understanding of their presence and absences, This feature simplifies the decision making process in regards to getting rid of employees who do not have a good attendance record
Ability to view and approve the number o: Ability to view and approve the number of leaves a certain employee has taken and requested for
